'''Bathysmal Vishap Experimental Records''' is a Quest Item obtained through completing the World Quest [[Tricolor File]]. At the end of [[Collection of Dragons and Snakes]], it is handed in, and can be interacted with after the quest completes to obtain an archive entry for [[The Byakuyakoku Collection]].
